member.name: P:System.ComponentModel.INotifyDataErrorInfo.HasErrors
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the entity has validation errors.
member.returns: true if the entity currently has validation errors; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Defines the method that determines whether the command can execute in its current state.
member.returns: true if this command can be executed; otherwise, false.
member.param: Data used by the command. If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to null.

member.name: E:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged
member.summary: Occurs when changes occur that affect whether or not the command should execute.

member.name: M:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.Execute(System.Object)
member.summary: Defines the method to be called when the command is invoked.
member.param: Data used by the command. If the command does not require data to be passed, this object can be set to null.
